# 2002 August-September Violet Wave Infusion completes, Gold Wave infusion D7/D8 activates Earth Core

2002 August-September: Violet Wave Infusion completes, Gold Wave infusion D7/D8 activates Earth Core
(originally 2010 June). RRTs Tibet and Sarasota FL, GA Level-9 "4 Faces of Man'' LPlN, NCT-Bases Lhasa
